names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Resina Liquidamberis Taiwanianae Resina Liquidamberis Formosanae

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood and alleviates pain
Detoxifies, stops bleeding and cools the Blood and generates flesh

indications: Hemoptysis, hematemesis, epistaxis, carbuncles, deep-rooted boils, ulcers, scrofula, furuncles, toothache and bleeding from incised wounds
